name: Needs
description:
Controls: Click and hold your mouse button.

---

The more needs you fulfill, the faster they fill up! What's your high score? 

If the colorful need bars fill up all the way, you lose.

If you drain a bar all the way to zero, you get +1 point.

To drain a need bar, find the screen with the same background color and click and hold on the object in the center of the screen.

---

Coded from scratch using Python and Pyglet.

Made in 2 weeks for the the 2021 LOWREZJAM. 

The game is a true 64x64 pixels, but is upscaled to 500% the size so it's easier to see.

Pixel art by me, sound effects by me and Kelsey Henderson.
